sections.instructor: Levin, Anna, Advisory: ENGL-C1000 or equivalent Note: Class meets on campus as scheduled. Labs will meet Thursdays 12:55PM - 4:05PM either outdoors at regional parks to study local ecosystems or in our lab room at the Pleasant Hill Campus. This class includes field trips to: Ano Nuevo, the Marine Mammal Center, Pillar Point Tidepools and local regional parks.
